title: How to Fix Sudden Function Changes on my Pixel 3a XL
content:
Suddenly, certain things on my phone changed. Again, this happened suddenly.
For example
- I can no longer turn on my mobile phone data. 
- I can no longer double-click on power button to activate the camera
- The screenshot function is no longer there when I hit the power button, only power off, restart, and emergency are the only options
- System navigation buttons, only the back button work, the switch app and home button doesn't work
